titles.title: Thy Word Sheds Light Upon My Path

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: In my distress I plead with Thee, send help according to Thy Word; accept my sacrifice of praise and make me know Thy judgments, LORD.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In danger oft and nigh to death, Thy law remembered is my aid. The wicked seek my overthrow, yet from Thy truth I have not strayed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thy precepts are my heritage, for daily they my heart rejoice; to keep Thy statutes faithfully shall ever be my willing choice.
